Ronaldo's Al-Nassr exit Asian Champions League with shootout loss to Al-AinCristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr crashed out of the Asian Champions League in the quarter-finals after the Saudi Pro League side lost 3-1 on penalties to Al-Ain in a pulsating game on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:06:34 GMT 4X5ZCW5TURLXDOGP4HRBPHCLYQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/ronaldos-al-nassr-exit-asian-champions-league-with-shootout-loss-al-ain-2024-03-11/Michael Church运动的足球
Hypersonic weapon startup Castelion has first prototype missile testCastelion, a startup trying to build a hypersonic weapon for the Pentagon, tested its system for the first time, it told Reuters on Monday, as a growing group of small hypersonic arms makers challenge large defense contractors with less expensive, rapidly produced products. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 17:01:20 GMT NNI2HAB4WZKI3GNBGB2Y6NFAP4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/hypersonic-weapon-startup-castelion-has-first-full-weapon-test-2024-03-11/Mike Stone商业航空航天与国防
Coalmine explosion in eastern China kills sevenSeven people have died and two are missing after a gas explosion at Huaihe Energy's coalmine in China's eastern Anhui province on Monday, state broadcaster CCTV reported. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 15:36:50 GMT 4P452EZ7HFKNHAAHMDSWE4TNY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/coalmine-explosion-eastern-china-kills-7-2024-03-11/Reuters世界中国
Trump calls TikTok a threat but says some kids could 'go crazy' without itU.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Monday that TikTok was a national security threat but also said that a ban on the popular app would hurt some kids and only strengthen Meta Platforms' Facebook, which the Republican has harshly criticized. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 15:09:39 GMT EJIHHQ2WF5PHFAYDBXBYZ2IGG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/tiktok-us-security-threat-says-trump-similar-facebook-cnbc-2024-03-11/David Shepardson世界美国
Russia, Iran and China to hold warship drills in Gulf of OmanRussia said a group of its warships had arrived in Iran to take part in drills with Iran and China in the Gulf of Oman and the Arabian Sea. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:20:33 GMT QRWH6MMYSVOXXOX6WBGCULW2Z4 https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-iran-china-hold-warship-drills-gulf-oman-2024-03-11/Reuters世界
Another Chinese research vessel spotted off India, fuelling uneaseA second Chinese research vessel in two months has been spotted near India's coast, adding to New Delhi's anxiety over possible military intelligence-gathering in its backyard. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 10:33:38 GMT 4N2O746LZZM6JECNHL66OWQ5XU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/another-chinese-research-vessel-spotted-off-india-fuelling-unease-2024-03-11/Krishn Kaushik世界印度
China to increase number of response teams for new infectious diseasesChina will increase the number of specialised teams tasked with responding to future infectious disease outbreaks by five to 25, its top health official has said. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 08:39:15 GMT TMOEJCKKWBNYJDOFJYJDS6OUSM https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/china-increase-number-response-teams-new-infectious-diseases-2024-03-11/Andrew Silver商业医疗保健与制药
China's choreographed political meet carries message of controlChina's National People's Congress has discussed everything from Taiwan to technology, but observers say the key message - both in substance and style - has been clear: more control for President Xi Jinping and a deeper focus on national security. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 08:25:38 GMT VLZB54ZKPNL37MFSK27AUGGJDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-choreographed-political-meet-carries-message-control-2024-03-11/Colleen Howe, Laurie Chen, Liz Lee世界中国
China passes law granting Communist Party more control over cabinetChina's parliament on Monday revised a law to effectively grant the Communist Party more executive control over China's cabinet, the State Council, after cancelling the premier's post-parliament news conference for the first time in three decades. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 07:20:06 GMT MW5EQACUAZLSBIKVM7XJNMXBXI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-passes-law-granting-communist-party-more-control-over-cabinet-2024-03-11/Mei Mei Chu, Laurie Chen世界中国
Exclusive: Chinese regulators ask large banks to step up support for VankeChina has asked banks to enhance financing support for state-backed China Vanke and called on creditors to consider private debt maturity extension, in a rare intervention from central government to help an embattled property firm, two sources said. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 03:07:38 GMT RUIYSBKZORODBF2YFMT75DNICI https://www.reuters.com/business/chinese-regulators-ask-large-banks-step-up-support-vanke-sources-say-2024-03-11/Reuters商业
China trying to 'normalise' military drills near Taiwan: island's top security officialTaiwan's top security official told parliament on Monday that China runs "joint combat readiness patrols" near the democratic island every 7-10 days on average, saying Chinese forces were trying to "normalise" drills near Taiwan. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:48:53 GMT 7Q7GIMPQFJKGJEI7334JB23CKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-trying-normalise-military-drills-near-taiwan-islands-top-security-official-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
